comment.body:
> to not show sensitive information like connected sites 

D: any particular reason to not show the list of sites? I see that as one of the main uses of a proxy: to get a general list of sites/peers that'd be much larger than what my own machine is capable of pulling.

Also, having the start page have a huge list of sites makes it more friendly to newbies who might not know their way around ZeroNet. Seems like a weird decision. I can understand lacking newsfeeds and that sort of thing though.
